title: Trump Establishes Strategic Crypto Reserve, Expanding U.S. Digital Asset Strategy
summary: President Trump signed an executive order establishing a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve, committing the U.S. government to stockpile Bitcoin, Ether, XRP, Solana, and Cardano. The reserve will be capitalized through forfeited assets and aims to position the U.S. as a global leader in cryptocurrency adoption. The initiative sparked both market excitement and industry skepticism.
description: The Strategic Crypto Reserve will hold approximately $17 billion in Bitcoin and $400 million in other digital assets, sourced primarily from government asset forfeitures. The initiative prohibits selling deposited Bitcoin, treating it as a strategic reserve asset analogous to gold.

sources.title: Trump proposal to create 'crypto strategic reserve' vexes some industry supporters
